title: Stay By My Side
overview: Bu Xia, a young man raised by his grandfather, finds his world turned upside down when he starts hearing mysterious voices after his grandfather's funeral. Convinced he's losing his mind, Bu Xia seeks answers and is shocked to discover that the voices are actually the spirits of the departed. When he realizes that being around his roommate Jiang Chi makes the voices disappear, Bu Xia becomes determined to get closer to him. As their relationship deepens, both Bu Xia and Jiang Chi find themselves caught in a whirlwind of emotions and secrets that will challenge their understanding of the supernatural and their own desires.
